DataListSpec.Name: Website Sponsorship Payments Data List
DataListSpec.Description: Used to display the payments for a particular child on the website.
DataListSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

SPDataList.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATALIST_WEBSITECHILDSPONSORSHIPPAYMENTS(@ID nvarchar(73)) as set nocount on;
declare @REVENUEID as uniqueidentifier set @REVENUEID = cast (left (@ID, CHARINDEX ('|', @ID)-1) as uniqueidentifier)
declare @SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID as uniqueidentifier set @SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID = cast (right(@ID, len(@ID)-charindex ('|', @ID)) as uniqueidentifier)
SELECT REVENUE.DATE, sum(RECURRINGGIFTINSTALLMENTPAYMENT.AMOUNT) as AMOUNT, -- sum by date 'Payment' as ACTIVITYTYPE FROM dbo.RECURRINGGIFTINSTALLMENTPAYMENT inner join dbo.RECURRINGGIFTINSTALLMENT on RECURRINGGIFTINSTALLMENT.ID = RECURRINGGIFTINSTALLMENTPAYMENT.RECURRINGGIFTINSTALLMENTID inner join dbo.REVENUE on REVENUE.ID = RECURRINGGIFTINSTALLMENTPAYMENT.PAYMENTID inner join dbo.REVENUESPLIT rs on rs.REVENUEID = RECURRINGGIFTINSTALLMENT.REVENUEID inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIP s on s.REVENUESPLITID = rs.ID and s.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = @SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID
WHERE RECURRINGGIFTINSTALLMENT.REVENUEID = @REVENUEID and REVENUE.DATE >= '11/1/12' and REVENUE.DATE >= s.STARTDATE
group by REVENUE.DATE
order by DATE desc
